text: The Assembly of the Union ( Pyidaungsu Hluttaw) is the de jure national-level bicameral legislature of Myanmar (officially known as the Republic of the Union of Myanmar) created by the 2008 National Constitution. The Pyidaungsu Hluttaw is made up of two houses, the House of Nationalities, a 224-seat upper house as well as the Pyithu Hluttaw, a 440-seat lower house. ==Other websites== * Official website of Pyithu Hluttaw Category:Politics of Myanmar Category:National legislatures Myanmar
title: Assembly of the Union
